short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Cute Browser Pet for EDG!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
电人桌宠！领一只Flandre/Jiejie/Scout/Viper/Meiko回家吧

功能：
1. 可以按下← →进行移动，也可以使用鼠标拖动
2. 可以按下↑进行跳跃
3. 点击右键的菜单栏里可以直接跳转经典回顾：2021世界赛EDG vs DK
4. 点击右上角插件的Meiko头像可以更换人物
5. 小心！EDG的队员们可能会慢慢吃掉你输入到文本框里的一切！（按下↓启用/禁止本功能，当没有东西吃的时候，他会向你眨眨眼）

作者：黄飞廉，吕虹云

EDG Browser Pet! We have Flandre/Jiejie/Scout/Viper/Meiko

Functions:
1. Press ← → to move, and you can also drag them.
2. Press ↑ to jump.
3. Right Click and you can see the classical moment when EDG won worlds 2021: there is an option to open a new tab playing EDG vs DK
4. You can change your character in the top right popup window. Just remember to pin this extension and click the icon. 
5. Watch out! They eat whatever you try to type into an input! (Press ↓ to activate/deactivate this function. If they have nothing to eat, they will wink)

Author: Feilian Huang
Artist: Hongyun Lv
